about_the_game:
Guragura Oden" is a casual balance puzzle game.
Pile up the ingredients high in the unstable shaking earthenware pot.

Ingredients
Ingredients in this game are life forms with faces and hands.
It would be nice if you could take care of them.

Hand-holding
If you connect the hands of ingredients, they are connected and your score will be increased.
If the ingredients are the same, they can be connected by other means than hands, so think carefully about where to drop them.

■Exchange of pots and pans
When all the quota ingredients are placed in an earthenware pot, you can "exchange pots" to move to the next level of pots.
The score is calculated when you exchange pots, so you should pile up as many pots as possible before exchanging pots.

■Skewer
The ingredients and connected ingredients that have been skewered will be fixed to the pot and will not fall out.

Fever skewer
Each time you pile up ingredients, the gauge will accumulate and you can use the "Fever Skewer".
The ingredients that are hit with the "Fever Skewer" will disappear from the pot, so be sure to use it properly.

The game is over when the ingredients fall out of the pot!
Relax and enjoy the game while looking at the cute ingredients.

short_description: Do you know the traditional Japanese dish "Oden"? This is a puzzle game in which you pile up ingredients in an earthenware pot that shakes unsteadily and unsteadily! Try to pile up ingredients until the pot loses its balance and collapses to get a high score!
